text: So you get motivation from helping people? That's really good would you consider doing anything in healthcare? Even if it was biochemical research for a disease or something like that? I used to love playing netball, defence was always bad for me I'm not aggressive enough :joy: I now play badminton with some people from work! It was about my project and what I've done so far I've looked at membranes for concentration purposes which is interesting (for me anyway :nerd_face:) and I had to present again today to an important person at my work.. I've realised work includes a lot of presentations haha! I get super nervous also I think with time & practice it improves. Have you had to do many presentations?

Would you say you struggle with any of these things: Stress from deadlines/exams, persuading others or being assertive? I can give you some examples of how I deal with those things or advice if you'd like?
